text: Khabees aurten khabees mardon kay laeeq hain aur khabees mard khabees aurton kay laeeq hain aur pak aurten pak mardon kay laqeeq hain aur pak mard pak aurton kay laeeq hain. Aisay pak logon kay mutalliq jo kuch bakwas (bohtan baaz) ker rahey hain woh inn say bilkul bari hain inn kay liye bakhsish hai aur izzat wali rozi
